# Ring Color

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                    | Support     |
|--------------------------|-------------|
| `ring-inherit`           | 🌐 Web only |
| `ring-current`           | 🌐 Web only |
| `ring-transparent`       | 🌐 Web only |
| `ring-black`             | 🌐 Web only |
| `ring-white`             | 🌐 Web only |
| `ring-{n}`               | 🌐 Web only |
| `ring-[n]`               | 🌐 Web only |
